Name: Californian Martini
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A medium dry, fragrant orange Martini
Nutrition: One serving of Californian Martini contains 185 calories
